item.title: Little Bio
item.description: I am an Assistant Professor in Statistics at the Department of Statistical Sciences, University of Rome - La Sapienza. Previously I was an assistant professor at University of Trieste and postdoctoral researcher at University of Padova. I obtained my PhD at University of Rome - La Sapienza under the supervision of professor Pierpaolo Brutti. During and after my PhD I had the chance to collaborate with other researchers, such as David Kraus, Laura Sangalli, Antonio Canale and Stefano Mazzuco.

item.title: My Collaborators
item.description: I’ve shared pain and gain with some other researchers in statistics-related fields, most of them are listed here.
